CustomField.description: Shows values from fields Phone, Address, Email or Data Box Number based on the picklist value in field Type__c.
CustomField.formula: IF ( (ISPICKVAL(Type__c, '1')), Street__c + ' ' + HouseNumber__c + ', ' + City__c + ', ' + PostalCode__c + ', '+ Text(Country__c), IF( (ISPICKVAL(Type__c, '2')), PhoneNumber__c , IF( (ISPICKVAL(Type__c, '3')), Email__c + DataBoxNumber__c, IF( (ISPICKVAL(Type__c, '4')), DataBoxNumber__c ,'neuvedeno'))))
CustomField.label: Value
